property.name: Text
property.value: Welcome to Jake's Journey! The object is to get to the exits. Don't screw up!

property.name: Text
property.value: It's obvious you've done this before. You're going to do great.

property.name: Text
property.value: Use the arrow keys to move around.

property.name: Text
property.value: For the new-school crowd, you can also use the W,A,S, and D keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Press and hold the Down (or S) key to sprint downward.

property.name: Text
property.value: That's really all there is to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Press and hold the Up (or W) key to sprint up.\n(Are you sensing a pattern?)
